item.title: ||kabbo's song on the loss of his tobacco pouch
item.summary: ||kabbo's song sung on the occasion of the theft of his tobacco pouch by the dog 'Blom'. It concerns his 'tobacco-hunger'.
item.comments: 1) see The loss of ||kabbo's tobacco bag, which was stolen by a hungry dog, belonging to !gou !nui, named 'Blom', 2) This story is found in Book VIII-1
item.author: |hanâ‰ kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: ||kabbo's song about hunger for, after the loss of his tobacco pouch
and ||kabbo's song about 'tobacco-hunger' and the loss of his tobacco pouch
